events.message: I ordered a jacket last week and unfortunately it arrived with stains. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back because of the stained product.
The support case was assigned to agent Lisa Martinez for further handling of the refund request.
Hello, this is Lisa from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your jacket, and I’m here to assist you.
Could you please provide photos of the stained jacket and your order number so I can process your refund quickly?
Sure, I’ve attached the photos showing the stains clearly and my order number is 987654321.
Thank you for the details. I have submitted your refund request; you should receive confirmation and the money back within 5 business days.
Thanks for the prompt help! I appreciate the quick processing and will wait for the refund confirmation.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. Please check your payment method in a few days for the refund.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case.
Yes, I got the refund today. Thank you very much for the excellent support.
The case has been closed following confirmation of refund reception and customer satisfaction.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on their experience with the refund process.
